attributes.action: Masterchef to be on more than once a week
attributes.additional_details:
After an initially super start to the new series (with 3 episodes a week), we now find ourselves in a "twilight" zone with Masterchef only being on once a week. During the winter and with no X Factor or Britains Got Talent to speak of, we must ask that a new Masterchef episode is aired daily.

Regards
